mapper.select: select traid from wh_tra where title = #{tratitle}
SELECT t.mlproid,t.mlproshortitel from wh_decproject t ORDER BY t.mlprotime DESC

SELECT b.*,u.name,a.actvisenrol,a.actvshorttitle,a.actvaddress,am.actvitmonemax,am.actvbmsdate,am.actvbmedate,am.actvitmsdate,am.actvitmedate,am.actvitmdpcount,am.actvitmbmcount from wh_activitybm as b LEFT JOIN wh_user as u on b.actbmuid=u.id left join wh_activity as a on b.actid=a.actvid LEFT JOIN wh_activityitm as am on b.actvitmid=am.actvitmid where 1=1
and b.actbmuid=#{actbmuid}
and b.actbmstate = 0
and b.actbmstate=1 AND(b.actshstate=0 or b.actshstate=3)
and b.actbmstate = 1 and (b.actshstate = 1 or b.actshstate = 2)
order by b.actbmtime desc
SELECT a.actvtype,a.actvarttyp,a.actvarea from wh_activity a,wh_brand b,wh_brand_act ba where a.actvid=ba.bracactid and b.braid=ba.braid and b.brastate=3 ORDER BY ba.bracsdate

SELECT c.*,a.actvaddress from wh_cfg_list c,wh_activity a where c.cfgshowid=a.actvid and cfgenttype='2016101400000052' and cfgpagetype='2016102900000006' and cfgstate=1 ORDER BY cfgshowidx asc,cfgshowidx desc
SELECT c.*,t.typname from wh_cfg_list c,wh_typ t where c.cfgenttype=t.typid and c.cfgenttype='2016103100000001' and c.cfgpagetype='2016102900000006' and c.cfgstate=1 ORDER BY c.cfgshowidx desc

select actvrefid from wh_activityitm where actvitmstate=1
and actvrefid in
#{item}
group by actvrefid

SELECT s.*,t.name from wh_successor s,whg_ywi_type t where s.suorqy=t.id
and suorid=#{suorid}

SELECT d.mlproshortitel,d.mlprosmpic,d.mlproid,d.mlprotime,t.name from wh_decproject d,whg_ywi_type t where d.mlprolevel=t.id and d.mlprostate=6
and mlproid in
#{item}
order by d.mlprotime desc

SELECT * from wh_successor t WHERE 1=1
and t.suorid = #{suorid}

SELECT a.actvtags,a.actvid,a.actvshorttitle,a.actvintroduce,a.actvbigpic,a.actvpic,a.actvphone,a.actvaddress,am.actvitmsdate,am.actvitmedate from wh_activitybm b LEFT JOIN wh_user u on b.actbmuid=u.id left join wh_activity a on b.actid=a.actvid LEFT JOIN wh_activityitm am on b.actvitmid=am.actvitmid where 1=1
and b.actbmuid=#{actbmuid}
and b.actbmstate = 0
and b.actbmstate=1 AND(b.actshstate=0 or b.actshstate=3)
and b.actbmstate = 1 and (b.actshstate = 1 or b.actshstate = 2)
order by b.actbmtime desc

SELECT actvid itemId, actvtype typeId, actvintroduce intro, actvbigpic thumb, actvpic image, actvphone phone, actvtags tag, actvarea district, actvaddress address, actvshorttitle title, actvdetail, actvintroduce, actvenroldesc FROM wh_activity WHERE actvstate = 3
and actvid=#{actvid}
select braid itemId,braintroduce intro,bratitle title,brapic thumb,brasdate begin,braedate end from wh_brand where brastate=3

SELECT waa.id AS id, waa.name AS name, date_format(waa.crtdate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') AS crtdate, waa.imgurl AS imgurl, waa.sellticket AS sellticket, waa.actsummary AS actsummary, waa.starttime as starttime, waa.endtime as endtime, waa.address, (SELECT COUNT(wc.cmid) FROM wh_collection wc WHERE wc.cmrefid = waa.id AND wc.cmopttyp = 2) as dianzan, (SELECT COUNT(wc.cmid) FROM wh_collection wc WHERE wc.cmrefid = waa.id AND wc.cmopttyp = 0) as shoucang FROM whg_act_activity waa
waa.state = 6 AND waa.delstate = 0
AND waa.etype LIKE concat('%',#{param.etype},'%')
AND waa.areaid = #{param.areaid}
AND waa.starttime > now()
AND waa.starttime < now() AND waa.endtime > now()
AND waa.endtime < now()
AND waa.isrecommend = 1
ORDER BY waa.statemdfdate DESC
